noti.title: Learn something new every day to enrich your mind and elevate your life.
noti.description: Commit to exploring at least one new concept daily!

youtube.title: Learn Effectively on YouTube
youtube.description: You can choose a video you want to study on Youtube, drop it here, and start studying with the Pomodoro method, take notes, and more

programing.name: Programming
programing.description: Unlock the digital world: Embark on a programming journey, learn coding languages, and build your own websites, apps, or even games.

design.name: Design
design.description: Unleash your creativity: Explore a world of design courses, from graphic design to UX/UI, and bring your ideas to life.

languages.name: Language
languages.description: Break language barriers: Explore a world of languages, connect with diverse cultures, and expand your horizons.

photograph.name: Photography
photograph.description: Capture the world through your lens: Photography courses teach you the art of capturing moments, emotions, and stories through stunning images.

softskills.name: Soft Skills
softskills.description: Master essential life skills: Soft skills courses help you develop effective communication, leadership, and teamwork abilities.

subject.name: Subjects
subject.description: Explore & Expand: Dive into diverse subjects, gain new insights, and unlock your potential.
